Share Incident Updates with Broadcast Communications

When an incident occurs, share updates with customers at scale with broadcast communications.

After setup, teams can use these broadcast types:

Broadcast Alert
Broadcast Email
Broadcast Site Banner
Broadcast Slack Message

Set Up Broadcast Communications
Use Broadcast Communications to inform internal and external stakeholders of urgent issues.
Notify groups via alerts, Slack messages, emails, or site banners.
title: Broadcast Communications in Service Cloud
